name: azure-image-gen
description: OpenClaw skill scaffold to generate images using a Microsoft Foundry model.

env.name: FOUNDRY_ENDPOINT
env.description: Azure base URI for Foundry (must include scheme, e.g. https://<name>.cognitiveservices.azure.com/)

env.name: FOUNDRY_API_KEY
env.description: API key for the Foundry deployment (primary credential)

env.name: FOUNDRY_DEPLOYMENT
env.description: Deployment name to call (for example FLUX-1.1-pro)
